overview_of_class:
This course will focus on technology to trap and cool atoms and molecules and the applications.

Topics include:
-Interaction between atoms and light
-Laser cooling
-Neutral atom traps
-Ion traps
-Atomic clocks
-Precision searches for physics beyond the Standard Model of particle physics
-Quantum information processing
name: Advanced Topics in Condensed Matter
title: WCAS PHYSICS 450-0-1 Advanced Topics in Condensed Matter
